name: Adventure 2D Platform Tileset
description:
Hi!

This is an updated version of my other asset Adventure 2D Tileset.  This version is designed to be used in larger screen games in platforms like Unity and has uptades and new tiles, backgrounds and objects!

This pack contains:

- Up to 5 2304x1296 or 2840x2160 layer background 

- 29 256x256 Main Tiles and 16 256x256 Background Tiles

- 26 Tileable and Non-Tileable Decorative objetcs

Feel free to send me messages or leave a comment if you have questions or need more info!
